publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7944 Bob Doris: International Childhood Cancer Awareness Day—That the Parliament notes that 15 February 2011 is International Childhood Cancer Awareness Day; commends the good work of the many organisations, such as Youth Cancer Forum Scotland, in supporting those individuals with cancer; welcomes the Scottish Government’s progress in meeting targets in relation to cancer and in reducing waiting times for diagnosis, and longs for the day when a cure can be found for this dreadful condition that affects so many people. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, John Wilson*, Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-7944 International Childhood Cancer Awareness Day (lodged on 15 February 2011) Jack McConnell*
S3M-7944 International Childhood Cancer Awareness Day (lodged on 15 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-7944 International Childhood Cancer Awareness Day (lodged on 15 February 2011) Linda Fabiani*
